description: The file is a source code file for a frontend web application built with Qwik, implementing a notes management UI with authentication and CRUD operations.

classes.name: Header
classes.description: Header component displaying app branding and user info with logout button

classes.name: Sidebar
classes.description: Sidebar component with note list, search, and new note button

classes.name: MainContent
classes.description: Main editor area for viewing and editing notes

classes.name: AuthOverlay
classes.description: Overlay component for user login and registration

methods.name: fmt
methods.description: Helper function to format date strings into locale-specific strings
